mainContent.heading: What is the Before and After Image Slider Section?
paragraphs: The Before and After Image Slider section is a Shopify section designed to visually compare two images using a draggable slider.
It is commonly used to showcase transformations, product results, improvements, or comparisons in a clear and interactive way.
By allowing visitors to control the slider, this section builds trust and helps highlight real differences more effectively than static images.

features.title: Interactive Comparison
